author: Hemsley + Hemsley
method: Preheat the oven to 250C/220C Fan/Gas 9. Season the carrot batons with salt. In a large bowl, mix together the ground almonds, parmesan, oregano and cayenne pepper until well combined. Dip each baton into the beaten egg, then dredge in the herb-and-spice mixture until evenly coated. Arrange the carrot fries in a single layer on a baking tray. Bake for 10-12 minutes, turning during cooking, until tender and golden-brown all over. Serve hot.
ingredients: 2 large carrots, trimmed, cut into long, thin batons (these should resemble French fries in size and shape),  salt, to taste,  50g/2oz ground almonds ,  30g/1¼oz parmesan, grated                                   ,  1⁄2 tsp dried oregano ,  small pinch cayenne pepper,  1 free-range egg, beaten
